analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa  dhamma paccanīya duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi
translated: The Book of Conditional Relations🔽The Chapter on Pairs, the Text on the Pairs in Direct-Order

original: 8.8. Saṅkhataduka🔽Naasaṅkhataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naasaṅkhato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: saṅkha taduka  na asaṅkhatam dhammam paṭicca na asaṅkhataḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā
translated: The Conditioned Pairs🔽With an unconditioned dhamma as condition, an unconditioned dhamma arises … (as in the section on the unconditioned, §1, but with the words “with a conditioned dhamma as condition” instead of “with an unconditioned dhamma as condition”).

analyzed: hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka sappaccaya duka sadisa
translated: With root-cause as condition, a root-cause … (as in the section on the unconditioned, §1, but with the words “with a conditioned dhamma as condition” instead of “with an unconditioned dhamma as condition”).
